A Barren Plain.LONGDESC: As you move away from the cliff face the terrain gets more plain as the only features are plain brown grass, the occasional rock and a few scrubby trees. You can see something far off in the distance to the north, each other direction is more of the plain as far as the eye can see.
A Barren Plain.SHORTDESC: To the north the plain seems to extend for quite some ways in all directions to the south is the cliff face
SOUTH: The Edge of a Cliff Face
